page.title: 16 PRESENT AND FUTURE
page.content: Recently many newcomers have moved to here. One newer resident thinks, { "The rural character of the village {should be preserved and buildings of {historical interest conserved (church, {village green, allotments, ancient {footpaths, etc.) Future development {should be carefully considered in {keeping with the character of the {village and rural crafts encouraged." An old resident said about housing, { "As part of the village is old {property in a conservation area, these {houses are expensive to maintain and {repair. New properties should be two {bedrooms suitable for young people or {those whose families have left home {and a small number of bungalows {preferably owned by the W.D. Council {for older people. On marrying most of {our young people have to leave because {there is no suitable accommodation."
